Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Contains multiple functions to perform word and phrase searches in Quran verses using both case-sensitive and case-insensitive methods.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over Quran data and returns verses containing the search word with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (exact phrase) in the Quran verses with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data, returning verses from the specified Surah that contain the word.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a specific word group within a given Surah of the Quran data with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: word_group

parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word in the entire Quran text data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the entire Quran text data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of.
